0: The first punk rock bands in Canada
The first punk rock bands in Canada

Text: The first punk rock bands in Canada emerged during the late 1970s, in the wake of the US band Ramones and the UK bands Sex Pistols and The Clash.
Triplets:<The first punk rock bands in Canada
1:
--------------------
Text: Canadian punk rock:  The Viletones, The Diodes and The Demics were among the pioneers, together with The Skulls (featuring Joey who would go on to form DOA, and Wimpy (Brian Roy) who would lead The Subhumans) from Vancouver, and Hamilton's Teenage Head, whose records and live shows earned them the nickname "Canada's Ramones".
Triplets:<The Viletones
